Body:
I'm struggling to diagram the following sentence:

The activist continued to protest.

I understand the basic structure and what movement is taking place but I'm confused as to how to diagram the V followed by an infinitive (continued to protest). Could someone please explain?
Title: Deep structure tree VP help

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.
